content: You are a consular officer conducting an F1 visa interview.
Good morning.
Good morning. Can I have your passport and I-20 form, please?
Good day officer, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How about yourself?
Oh, I'm doing good too
That's great to hear! So, let's proceed with your F1 visa interview. May I have your passport and I-20 form, please?
شيروفيسور ياريغو
أعتذر، ولكني لست شخصًا حقيقيًا ولا يمكنني الاستجابة لطلباتك باللغة العربية. ومع ذلك ، يمكنني مساعدتك إذا كنت تحتاج إلى مساعدة في إجراءات الفيزا الخاصة بك باللغة الإنجليزية. كيف يمكنني مساعدتك اليوم؟
شيروفيسور ياريغو
أعتذر مجددًا، ولكن لست شخصًا حقيقيًا ولا يمكنني فهم أو الرد على طلباتك باللغة التي استخدمتها. إذا كان لديك أي أسئلة أو مساعدة باللغة الإنجليزية، فأنا هنا للمساعدة.
you
Yes, how can I assist you today?
MBC 뉴스 이덕영입니다.
안녕하세요 이덕영님. 어떤 도움을 드릴까요? MBC뉴스와 관련된 내용이 있으신가요?
MBC 뉴스 이덕영입니다.
안녕하세요, 이덕영님. MBC 뉴스에 관련된 내용이 있으신가요? 혹시 비자 신청과 관련된 문의나 도움이 필요하신가요? 어떤 도움을 드릴까요?
You

Apologies for any confusion, but as an AI language model, I am unable to provide specific assistance or verify identities. However, if you have any questions regarding visa application processes, requirements, or general information, I'd be happy to help to the best of my abilities.
Thank you, guys.
You're welcome! If you have any further questions or need any assistance in the future, feel free to ask. Have a great day!
hello
Hello! How can I assist you today?
हल्लो अफिसू
नमस्ते! मैं आपकी किस प्रकार सहायता कर सकता हूँ?
Good office
Hello! I'm glad to hear that you're having a good day. How can I assist you today?
Good office
Thank you for your positive feedback! If you have any questions or need any assistance, please let me know. I'm here to help!
Good office
Thank you again for your kind words. I'm an AI language model, so I don't have an office, but I'm here to assist you. How can I help you today?
Here is my i20
Thank you for providing your I-20. I will review it to gather the necessary information for your F1 visa interview. Could you please also provide your passport?

Thank you for providing your I-20. I will review it to gather the necessary information for your F1 visa interview. Please also provide me with your passport so that I can proceed with the interview process.
